attributes.action: Save our sports centres , stop North Lanarkshire closures
attributes.additional_details: Save our sports centres and community hubs .
attributes.background:
Save our sports centres , North Lanarkshire are closing our local sports facilities that help a huge amount  of people keep healthy and support mental health. 

KEIR HARDIE centre has over 250 kids attending football and many other use clubs and other activities weekly

rejection.details:
Petitions must call for a specific action that the UK Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about the closure of a sports centre are a matter for its operators, not the Government or Parliament. As a result it is not possible for the Government or Parliament to take the action you have requested.

You could raise this issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them: https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
